## Load the necessary packages

```{r}
library(bioacoustics)
library(seewave)
```

```{r}
files = list.files("wav_files_playback", "*.wav", full.names=TRUE)
head(files)
sample = read_audio(files[1])
sample
oscillo(sample)
spectro(sample, flim=c(0,6.5))
```
